clinical_study.brief_title: Behavioral Activation for Depression Through Virtual Reality
clinical_study.official_title: Behavioral Activation for Depression Through Virtual Reality

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the effectiveness of a brief, virtual reality intervention for depressed mood

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline vs posttreatment)
primary_outcome.description: In a scale from 0 (not at all) to 6 (completely), "to what extent were you satisfied with what you did today?"

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline to posttreatment)
secondary_outcome.description: In a scale from 0 (completely sad) to 100 (completely happy), "how did you feel today?"

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days.. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline to posttreatment)
secondary_outcome.description: In a scale from 0 (not at all) to 3 (completely), "how was your level of depression today?"

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days.. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline to posttreatment)
secondary_outcome.description: In a scale from 1 (not at all) to 5 (completely), "how was your positive affect today?"

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days.. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline to posttreatment)
secondary_outcome.description: In a scale from 1 (not at all) to 5 (completely), "how was your negative affect today?"

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change through study completion, an average of 31 days.. The outcome will be evaluated daily (at 9pm) during 31 days. Changes will be investigated from baseline to posttreatment using all corresponding time points (baseline to posttreatment)
secondary_outcome.description: In a scale from 0 (minimum) to 100 (maximum), "what was your activity level today?"

arm_group.description: Use of google maps with virtual reality to virtually situate the participants into scenarios that are motivating for them (i.e., the beach, a mountain, a park, etc.) at their choice.

intervention.description: The investigators will encourage behavioral activation (increase in the number and time of conducted activities) situating the person in motivating situations using virtual reality

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 (measure of depression) over 9
- Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (measure of positive and negative affect): positive affect score below 24
- Age over 18 years
- Signs informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Completes more than 20% of evaluations retrospectively (not the day they are assigned)
- Has a severe mental health disorder as evaluated with the MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview
- Does not sign the informed consent

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be anonymized and will only be shared upon reasonable request without identifying information
